subject: Important Alert: Protect Yourself from the Premium Rate Service Scam
body:
Dear Customer,

 

At Jio, your safety and digital experience are our top priorities. We are reaching out to inform you about a growing scam that has been targeting mobile users across India – the Premium Rate Service Scam. This scam involves missed calls from international numbers, and we want to help you understand how it works and how to protect yourself.

 

What is the Premium Rate Service Scam?

 

This scam happens when you get a missed call from an unknown international number. Out of curiosity, you call back, only to connect to a premium-rate service. The charges for calling these international numbers are usually very high.

 

How Does the Scam Work?

  • Missed Call from an International Number: Scammers use unfamiliar international numbers to initiate the scam. You might receive a brief missed call from one of these numbers.
  • Returning the Call: If you return the call, you will be connected to a premium-rate service, which may incur hefty charges even for a short conversation.

How to Recognize the Scam

 

  • Missed Calls from Unfamiliar International Numbers: If you notice a missed call from an international number with an unfamiliar country code, it’s best not to return the call. Scammers often use international numbers to make it harder for you to recognize the scam.

 

How to Protect Yourself

 

Here are some simple steps to keep you safe:

 

  1. Identify International Numbers: Any incoming call from a number starting with a country code other than "+91" is an international call. Avoid calling back unknown international numbers to prevent unnecessary charges.

  2. Block Suspicious Numbers: If you receive a missed call from a suspicious international number, block it immediately to prevent future attempts by scammers.

  3. Be Cautious of Unsolicited Calls: Always be cautious when receiving unsolicited calls, whether from unknown international or local numbers. It’s better to be safe than sorry.

  4. Educate Yourself and Others: Share this information with your friends, family, and colleagues. The more people are aware, the less likely the scam will succeed.

 

At Jio, we are committed to keeping your experience secure. Stay safe, stay informed, and protect yourself from scams.

 

Warm regards,
Team Jio

subject: Annual reminder about Google Pay’s Terms of Service, Consumer Policy and Privacy Policy
body:
Wishing you a great 2025! As you know we’re constantly looking for ways to improve the Google Pay experience. This email is an annual reminder to surface our terms and policies that help explain how you interact with the app and the protections in place for your privacy and security.

These terms are important because they’ll make it easier for you to understand what to expect from Google Pay – and what we expect from you – as you use our services. As required under applicable law, we would like to inform you that your access to, and use of the Google Pay (IN) app, operated by Google India Digital Services Limited is governed by

• Google Pay Consumer Terms <https://notifications.google.com/g/p/ANiao5pXKuxBEmbNrAAUw-8F-ITmPYaZAeQ9ZRAMnbIjAHgqywfbf9yNrflFtdHvjTS0EHToBonqhnfLnpUI4_KQFCMG3RIyD8N-X52zWzdgnoT-gqV0mOtNmNU-Aq5HO-0RHkxb36_w6HtZtMrUKR6usWQ_OaTuhC-hLcFZJOL_Az8foMCLP6N4uih2neRai2QltSU55Pcv-OUFeGe4hN8tgmgMrtuMFjoV2s_XMyOWeqbsNGQSd1NWpSTJCe3Ucrmkm71aGBa94Ldq>

• Google Pay Consumer Policy <https://notifications.google.com/g/p/ANiao5rdE1dV5PzjLZ_ts4_WZu_BkLdyQ7WV-7VWmT9TIoFivf4BzkZNhlULMkYnEWLGndh7mnyBfPU6aZaWAg9oQHiD9hcE3YgVk661t6plCyDsc3yOI-Dh87oDjW7czUTIRcivK1tyKtuCWfkzN8in9jaHpOiGijVLwxF9MP7be8C87PwmT0gp4UPWFS7qzwr_fzjOM_Gz2xN5oB9z8JgvMj90P_qilk3tK4S2Si2UgqqI9G5Rkvc5HdMtv3IriOFDY1M4vnJUn5bcy7M>

• Google Privacy Policy <https://notifications.google.com/g/p/ANiao5pE2qW4DQ3GNPjkHIP4HrliljFFHH6cSBkh_2pt9mDCWPblt6GFdN7eQs8vo2BmLgj1TGFpEte14JEp-Pi-5YSWEP656qVY3XBLQx3X_l3LtOxrCLhmqKXtXOnuhqBFDaOJNFL8A9AdEKgfSYfQfRw5Ig6BjV8vvoPjXoPh0xr57QSHt7BfmhdnQuqv4sXvRJs0OKgX9YaLaWmFAUzDKx95NZKgPfCt5G_rZQzy-Wc2ddKaK7HZ2zN7>

Remember, respecting these terms is crucial to a smooth experience and we are happy to help if you need further explanation. Please adhere to these terms to maintain continued use of and access to Google Pay. Violation of these terms and guidelines may result in warnings or further action including termination of access to the app, which we hope to avoid.

Your trust and satisfaction mean everything to us. We hope you continue to enjoy a secure and helpful Google Pay experience.

Sincerely,

The Google Pay team

Stay in touch

Giving you more places and ways to pay with Google Pay

<https://notifications.google.com/g/p/ANiao5rDg7_wkv5r9dxyML8ZlcppwbRf0pD6w62cbNUd6GZEuJPR9OysX9S5MwvuoCl8MJPm4OWj7M8bFrVXGdl7XC9LUoN6qec7i-H3fu48q5cXjBHtPpswgyHonfOT1hSbHK_hBBZh08BZAmmqy8dmqTMj1onM5uXZIvKJ07DCVqmwvFqmou2LZpFkgj-025FNdNCzC80i3-MDA1nN0Xuq7qrddId6mcCD5WymIXDIPnhlvQU2FTjXClymhzYFOM-0vuKEJ8S9>
